name: Picaro
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Touch Only Option;Includes level editor;Family Sharing
description: Master the cards in this high-stakes roguelike! Every decision is life-or-death as you navigate treacherous dungeons. Use every card to escape. Strategy, resource management, and nerve-wracking choices await in an endlessly replayable challenge!

name: Hunk&Doggo : eat.nap.dig.idle.
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: A gentle presence during your work. Hunk quietly mines while Doggo roams freely at the corner of your desktop. Comes with a built-in Pomodoro timer. Never distracting—but somehow comforting to have them there.

name: Fight in BC 146 ancient Roman Empire VR
description: Welcome to the mysterious journey of ancient Rome! This is a stimulating and intoxicating VR casual game that allows you to come to the glory of the ancient Roman era and explore magnificent buildings and beautiful scenery.

name: The Heart of Gold
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Shared/Split Screen Co-op;Shared/Split Screen;Full controller support;Remote Play Together;Family Sharing
description: The Heart of Gold is a Bullet Heaven game with RPG elements, where each character is unique thanks to their own abilities, progression, and combat style. Upgrade your equipment, evolve your weapons, collect cards, and survive hordes of enemies in a colorful world full of secrets and challenges.

name: Abandoned Passage
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;LAN Co-op;Steam Achievements;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound;Steam Cloud;Stats;Family Sharing
description: The Grandview has a history, and it wants you to be a part of it. The secrets here are not buried - they are waiting.

name: The Shadow Cosmos Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound
description: The first part of the game. The Shadow Cosmos is a 3D metroidvania action game with retro aesthetic. Explore an interconnected world, gain new abilities, collect shadows and fight with your halberd. As master peacock, delve into a mysterious world, find the king and take his shadow.

name: 空王座 Empty Throne
description: Empty Throne is a dark fairytale puzzle game. Compose the Snow Queen’s tale in music. Truth twists through alley whispers and forest echoes. The throne lies empty. The mirror speaks. Who writes the ending—you, or the lie?

name: Fade Survival
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;LAN PvP;Cross-Platform Multiplayer;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound;Family Sharing
description: Fade Survival is a survival game set in a harsh, unforgiving world. Scavenge, build, and adapt as you face environmental challenges and the remnants of a fractured civilization. Every decision shapes your survival story.

name: DEADBOOT
description: DEADBOOT is a fast-paced retro roguelike FPS. Blast through randomized levels, scavenge weapons and upgrades along the way, and see how far you can make it in this neon death zone.

name: VR Blasteroids
description: Classic arcade action reimagined for virtual reality! Dodge, blast, and survive as you pilot your ship through swarms of asteroids and enemy drones in fully immersive 360° space battles.

name: Beam Time
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: A logic puzzle game where you redirect and split laser beams to create digital circuits. Through the campaign, you will explore basic logic gates, oscillators, latches, counters, adders, memory, and more.

name: Beta 3000
description: Join Marnie Barnaby and her new friends, the warrior Princess Xyla, and the robot Elysia, as they set out on a quest through the 80s cyberspace, exploring different worlds and settings, in order to stop a rogue computer virus from taking over and enslaving everyone.

name: RocketShip Go Up
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Navigate treacherous caverns in RocketShip Go Up, a physics-based 3D game. Master your thrusters to deliver packages, dodge beams, turrets, and falling debris—or speedrun for the fastest flight. Precision is your lifeline.

name: Shards of the library
description: A simulation puzzle game where everyday life and mystery intertwine on a farm as you uncover secrets beyond the books.

name: Next of Kin: Fidelity
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Step into the shoes of Bjorn Thompson, a man with a troubled past. One day he meets a woman who resembles one of Bjorn's childhood friends who disappeared and also shares the same name - Leyla. Is she his long-lost friend or someone else?

name: CARGO: Co-Op Delivery Simulator in Post Apocalyptic World
description: The world as we know it has ended. In this post-apocalyptic offroad sim, you're the last lifeline between the scattered remains of civilization. Embark on deliveries, brave hostile terrain, fight raiders, and build your own settlement, solo or with friends in co-op. People of Wasteland need you.

name: Gallium
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound;Family Sharing
description: A 3D platformer where you are being raced against the clock! Get the fastest time possible across all the elements in the Periodic Table of Elements while finding secrets! Keep a close eye for shortcuts though!

name: 呪温泉 The spring
description: The spring is a Japanese-style first-person horror game that can be completed in about an hour. Set in a silent hot spring inn, players must escape the looming terror and struggle to survive.

name: Farming Simulator 25 - Mercedes-Benz Trucks Pack
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Downloadable Content;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Align your farming business with the stars of Mercedes-Benz and Daimler Truck AG! The Mercedes-Benz Trucks Pack includes 17 machines and tools.

name: 霸世狂刀
description: "Overlord Frenzy Blade" is a casual combat game. Players start in the "Trial Ground" level. The top of the screen displays the number of gold coins and diamonds the player has, along with entrances to welfare and task features such as "7-Day Check-In", "Lucky Spin", and "Daily Quests".

name: Cursed House 2
description: Cursed House 2 is a Match 3 game. Almost all of its mechanics are unique and unlike anything in our other games. The game includes 15 groups of levels. Each group comes with its own unique objective and custom power-ups designed specifically for that objective.

name: Unicycle Sheep
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Can a sheep on a unicycle reach his goal? Start from a small island, learn to balance and ride your way toward the tallest mountain using a physics-driven unicycle. Ride through chaotic islands and tricky obstacles and try not to fall.

name: The Hallowed Garden
description: Mayor Macabre needs your help in this simple, cozy farming game! Play as Lil Ghostie, a farmer tasked with growing magical pumpkins for the Halloween Festival. Plant magical seeds, tend to them, and watch them grow into unique jack-o-lanterns! Unlock more patches, equipment, and story as you grow!

name: Grit & Grind
description: Grit & Grind is a retro arcade style RPG where you strive to make a difference amid a fast-paced world. Fight the Mob, shop at the grocery, chop trees or mine rocks, complete freedom! Navigate complex challenges, or build connections, and redefine what it means to thrive with purpose and impact.

name: Space Foodie
description: Welcome to the Space Age and become a Space Foodie.Run your restaurant spaceship and satisfy eccentric alien foodies. Explore the planet, hunt and gather precious ingredients from the universe... Fire up your restaurant spaceship to begin your gourmet journey, and set off!

name: Rescue Team: Lights. Camera. Outer Space
description: What began as the ultimate sci-fi blockbuster has become a worldwide threat: robots, practical effects, and experimental technology now threaten the entire ecosystem. As tempers flare, betrayal brews. Someone threatens to sabotage the entire project.

With vibrant 16-bit pixel art

description: Enjoy the numerous diverse, alien tracks of Fourmiworld in this multi-disc album - including a special six-song remix EP built right in!

name: 霓渊之城：爱神觉醒
categories: Multi-player;MMO;PvP;Online PvP;Co-op;Online Co-op;Steam Achievements;In-App Purchases;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Touch Only Option
description: 在2099年的賽博朋克都市「新烏托邦」，完美秩序的表象下是情感的荒漠。你將扮演維系這一秩序的頂級心靈審查官，手握潛入他人心智的禁忌之力。面對一群妄圖打破虛假平靜的美麗叛逆者，你必須攻破她們的心防，挖掘出最深層的秘密。在這場心智的較量中，通過聊天刺探弱點，潛入精神迷宮進行審查，並最終使用獨特的調教系統徹底征服並重塑她們的人格與忠誠。是成為秩序的冷酷守護者，還是欲望的終極主宰者？這座城市和這些女孩的命運，皆在你的一念之間。

name: DungeonRoute
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: In this ever-shifting dungeon, you can only move in the direction of the arrows. Once stepped on, tiles vanish, and the layout changes completely! The longer you walk, the more buffs you gain during combat—and the stronger the loot from treasure chests becomes! Keep walking, plan your path, and push ever deeper.

name: Click the Shape
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Steam Leaderboards;Family Sharing
description: Click The Shape is exactly what it sounds like: a game where you click a shape as fast as you can! Train your reaction time and aim for the highest leaderboard scores!

name: Myth Requiem
description: Myth Requiem is a mythology RPG with idle and auto-battle mechanics. Lead legendary heroes like Ulysses and Sun Wukong, explore ancient realms, and build a living bestiary by capturing, battling, and cataloging hundreds of legendary creatures in a story-driven quest for divine power.

name: 残阳 1645/1937
categories: Single-player;Adjustable Text Size;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Touch Only Option;Family Sharing
description: As a Ming officer in 1645’s Yangzhou & Jiangyin massacres, shield a girl from shouma fate while obeying orders. In 1937’s Battle of Yangzhou, protect a war journalist returned from Japan. Your choices decide their survival and shape their fates across 300 years.

name: Pau e Pedra
description: A casual battle royale focused on quick matches where players punch, throw rocks, and swing sticks in fast-paced, minimalist combat with friends.

name: LiveStream
description: You are a streamer who entered an abandoned building for hype. But the game quickly turns into a real nightmare — the chat and donations influence what’s happening, and you try to survive and understand what’s going on.
